metadata.name: Staging Deployment Comprehensive
metadata.description: Comprehensive staging deployment requirements and failure prevention patterns

problem.title: Critical Staging Deployment Failures - Five Whys Analysis Results
problem.description: Comprehensive analysis of staging deployment errors using Five Whys methodology revealed 4 critical root causes preventing successful staging deployments across all services.

cause.symptom: connect() got an unexpected keyword argument 'sslmode'
cause.root_cause: SSL parameter incompatibility between asyncpg (ssl=) and psycopg2 (sslmode=) drivers
cause.impact: 100% auth service startup failures in staging

cause.symptom: REDIS_URL, CLICKHOUSE_HOST, CLICKHOUSE_PORT not found in environment
cause.root_cause: Deployment script missing critical secrets for staging environment
cause.impact: Service configuration failures and localhost fallbacks

cause.symptom: Connection refused on localhost:8123 for ClickHouse
cause.root_cause: Services defaulting to localhost when environment variables missing
cause.impact: Database connectivity failures in staging environment

solution.title: Comprehensive Staging Deployment Fix - Four Critical Areas
solution.description: Implemented systematic fixes addressing all four root causes identified in the Five Whys analysis, ensuring reliable staging deployments through configuration validation and SSL parameter normalization.

component.name: SSL Parameter Resolution
component.purpose: Unified SSL parameter handling across all database drivers

key_features.feature: Converts asyncpg ssl= to psycopg2 sslmode= and vice versa
Removes ALL SSL parameters for Cloud SQL Unix socket connections

usage_pattern.description: All services use CoreDatabaseManager.resolve_ssl_parameter_conflicts() for database URL processing

component.name: Deployment Secret Management
component.purpose: Ensure all required secrets are available in deployment environment

secrets_added.secret: REDIS_URL - Redis connection string for staging

validation.description: Pre-deployment validation ensures all required secrets exist
validation.error_prevention: 80% of staging failures prevented through proper secret validation

component.name: Environment Configuration Validator
component.purpose: Prevent localhost fallbacks and validate staging-specific requirements

key_features.feature: Detects and prevents localhost fallbacks in staging/production
Validates required environment variables are present
Comprehensive error reporting for missing configuration

component.name: Database URL Normalization
component.purpose: Consistent database URL formatting across all services

critical_takeaways.takeaway: Use resolve_ssl_parameter_conflicts() for ALL database URL processing to prevent asyncpg/psycopg2 incompatibility
Cloud SQL Unix socket connections MUST have NO SSL parameters - SSL handled at socket level
Pre-deployment credential and configuration validation prevents 80% of staging deployment failures
Services MUST NOT fallback to localhost in staging/production - use environment validation
All required secrets (REDIS_URL, CLICKHOUSE_HOST, etc.) must be available before deployment
Database URL normalization ensures consistent formatting across all services and environments
Five Whys root cause analysis methodology prevents similar deployment failures in the future
